title: A Sketchy Soldier & EX-cessive Texts
itunes:title: A Sketchy Soldier & EX-cessive Texts
itunes:subtitle: Today, Anna and Sim chat with two callers in need of their ‘unqualified’ advice… …Paige, 24, met a military guy on a dating app and enjoyed several months of blissful dating…until things started to get sketchy. Now, Paige needs help determining whether th
description:
Today, Anna and Sim chat with two callers in need of their ‘unqualified’ advice…

…Paige, 24, met a military guy on a dating app and enjoyed several months of blissful dating…until things started to get sketchy. Now, Paige needs help determining whether this guy is just playing games with her or if he can actually be trusted.

…Lily, a soon-to-be-divorced mother of two, is confused by the excessive and somewhat inappropriate texts that her (almost) ex-husband has been sending her lately. Can Anna and Sim help her figure out how to respond appropriately?

Visit unqualified.com/contactto share your thoughts or send us your relationship questions – we love hearing from you!

 

Follow us!

Anna Faris: @annakfaris

Unqualified: @unqualified

 


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
